channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- U.Motion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- U.Motion

item.title: CVE-2017-7973|2024-09-16T16:13:23.912Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's U.motion Builder software versions 1.2.1 and prior in which an unauthenticated user can use calls to various paths allowing performance of arbitrary SQL commands against the underlying database.
